oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veteran Ben R. Stockton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Confederate veteran Ben R. Stockton visiting Phoenix, Arizona in 1919. He was paroled 1865 June 5 at Jacksonport, Arkansas. Stockton was a private in Co. I, 1st Ark. Cav. Regt. While born in Tennessee, he enlisted at Batesville, Arkansas.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stockton, Ben R.
